Shadai:
Rainbow Brooch Lavianrose activates 5 cells of precious stones. To make it is not so easy. Required 30 Shining Gems Shards and 1 Shard of the Rainbow Gem.
But I assure you, it's worth it. If you give me Chest of Precious Stone or Precious Stone Level 1, I will exchange them for the Shard of the Shining Gem.
Also Shard of the Rainbow Gem may be inside the Shard's Lair, but the chance is small.
When you collect all the materials, I will make for you Rainbow Brooch Lavianrose.
